title: OnOff Architects
manchet:
The project is digital portfolio of the interior design and architecture agency OnOff based in Warsaw.

The identity was design by Paulina Derecka and the website is just the part of it.

The portfolio is a showcase of large in size and quality images, hence the technology is limited to minimum. Most of the animations are done with CSS Transitions, although lightweight sliders in JavaScript are also applied. The project uses Wordpress CMS as easy-to-use backend.

media.caption: Overview of the landing page
media.description: Landing page is an introduction to the company values and silhouttes of the architects, as well as the project categories. The animations are run when visible on viewport.

media.caption: Top panorama
media.description: Top section is a 360 panorama of one of the client's realisations. Due to performance reasons and limited browsers compatibility at a time for WebGL, the panorama is generated in two ways: when applicable, it is full cubical panorama, that on mobile uses the gyroscope for the navigation. When not possible, it is a lightweight mp4 video.
